data.comment: The big names in today's match at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, In Ulsan, Ulsan Hyundai push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Free kick in a good position for Ulsan Hyundai!
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 10, Byung jin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ulsan Hyundai have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Ulsan Hyundai's Junior Negrao is whistled for offside at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 23, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Ulsan Hyundai are pushing forward but Yoon Bit-garam's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 24, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Yoon Bit-garam for Ulsan Hyundai has been booked by Byung jin Park and receives a first yellow card.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 29, Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
Ulsan Hyundai needs to be cautious. Jeonbuk have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Free kick Jeonbuk.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Jeonbuk.
In the minute 35, Gustavo (Jeonbuk) has missed a penalty!
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 40, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 45, Jo Gue-sung of Jeonbuk gets in a strike, but is off target.
Byung jin Park awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Ulsan.
Ulsan Hyundai's Chung-Yong Lee misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Byung jin Park blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Ulsan.
In the minute 46, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 49, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Jeonbuk are coming forward and Han Kyo-won gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Morais is making the team's first substitution at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium with Modou Barrow replacing Jo Gue-sung.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In Ulsan, Hong Jeong-ho (Jeonbuk) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 60, In Ulsan Ulsan Hyundai attack through Kim In-sung. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Byung jin Park signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
In the minute 62, Byung jin Park signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Ulsan Hyundai's area.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Modou Barrow.
Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Byung jin Park awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
In Ulsan Ulsan Hyundai drive forward through Junior Negrao. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lee Keun-ho is replacing Chung-Yong Lee for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 69, Free kick Jeonbuk.
Seol Young-woo is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 72, Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
The home team have replaced Sin Jin-ho with Kim Tae-hwan. This is the second substitution made today by Kim Do-Hoon.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Jose Morais (Jeonbuk) is making a second substitution, with Kim Bo-kyung replacing Takahiro Kunimoto.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 79, Play has been interrupted briefly in Ulsan to check on Han Kyo-won, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Han Kyo-won is back on the pitch.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Ulsan.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 84, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai make their third substitution with Lee Dong-kyeong replacing Junior Negrao.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
In the minute 89, Byung jin Park signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai just outside Jeonbuk's area.
At Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Yoon Bit-garam (Ulsan Hyundai) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Ulsan Hyundai drives forward and Yoon Bit-garam gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
The away team replace Gustavo with Shin Hyung-min.
